body.name: Contours Quick Elite Lightweight Compact Fold Travel Baby Stroller & Toddler Stroller, Infant Car Seat Compatibility, Multi-Position Seat Recline, Sun Canopy, 5-Point Safety Harness - Eclipse Black
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.

features: INFANT CAR SEAT COMPATIBILITY: Fits 30+ infant car seats, no adapter needed. See below for list of compatible infant car seats. Stroller grows with child from newborn to to big kid

ULTRA LIGHT: Lightweight (only 14.2 lb). Sturdy and compact lightweight travel stroller is Disney size approved and easily portable wherever your travels takes you and your family. The one-hand fold makes it an easy travel stroller solution
ADJUSTABLE SEAT RECLINE: Easy one-hand, multi-position seat can be reclined for on-the-go comfort. Perfect travel stroller for airplane and daily errands
PREMIUM FEATURES: Luxe vegan leather parent handle for a more comfortable grip and quilted seat fabric for a plush ride for your little one while you're travelling
PLENTY OF STORAGE: Extra-large underseat storage basket with separate parent storage pocket for your necessities. Child tray with built-in cupholder removes for easy access and convenience

SAFETY & COMFORT: Shock-absorbing front swivel wheels with suspension. Large UPF 50+ sun canopy with pullout visor for extra airflow and a peek-a-boo mesh window to easily check on your little one. Adjustable leg rest for babyâ€s comfort
body.description: Simply buckle & go in style! The Contours Quick Elite is a deluxe lightweight stroller that can easily accommodate 30+ different infant car seats, no adapter required, or fits a toddler up to 50 lb for use as a big kid stroller! At just over 14 lb, the lightweight design and easy one-hand fold makes this compact stroller easy to take with you on your strolls around the neighborhood, while travelling or at the airport. Front-wheel suspension helps navigate bumpy terrain, and a multi-position reclining seat keeps the ride enjoyable. Our UPF 50+ sun canopy has a pullout visor for extra coverage, a peek-a-boo window to easily check on your little one, and a 5-point safety harness with padded covers that can be adjusted as your child grows. Other must-have features of this travel stroller include a large underseat storage basket and parent cupholder to keep your items within easy reach, as well as a child tray with built in cupholder. The Quick Elite stroller has been engineered to perform for over 131 miles of testing, thats more than 5 marathons, for a premium quality ride.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SPECIFICATIONS STROLLER WEIGHT 14.15 lb WEIGHT LIMIT Stroller seat supports a child from 6 months up to 50 lb PRODUCT DIMENSIONS (ASSEMBLED) 33.50” L x 20.25” W x 39” H PRODUCT DIMENSIONS (FOLDED) 10.25” L x 20.25” W x 35” H SAFETY HARNESS Padded 5-point safety harness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love the simplicity of this stroller!!
reviews.reviewText: After watching the video on the order page I was able to put this stroller together in 10 minutes. It’s super duper easy and even the instructions manual is clear by illustrations. I love the simplicity of this stroller! It goes a long way!!Number one thing that impressed me about this stroller is the seat material! Most strollers you get nowadays are not cotton like this one and seem to get hot! Quilted seat fabric on this stroller is my absolute favorite!This stroller also seems to be wider than most I’ve seen. My almost three year old is super comfortable, smiling during the ride, with room to spare. My one year old fell asleep within 5 minutes.The back above head is wide mash so there’s plenty of circulation and the child is visible, along with the extra pocket window that is on top of canopy.The storage area is sufficient and larger than most travel strollers.The 5 point harness is simple to use. I am able to keep side straps together and just click each side into the strap that is in between the legs.The handle is cushioned vegan leather. It is not height adjustable. This was going to be my negative in the review, however I am 5’9” and it is a very comfortable height for me.There is a brake on each side of the back wheels. They’re a little stuff currently but I figure they’ll loosen up over time.I also love the adjustable leg rest so much! Originally I thought it’s just foldable for storage, but no! It retracts for when the baby is sleeping or it can be put down for a seating position for the child to rest feet on the actual leg rest for feet, underneath.The snack tray clicks in and out easily. It’s easy to clean/wash.The tires are plastic and can be put on and off easily if need be, for storage. While putting them on I did notice some substance leak out that makes them a very smooth ride.The cup holder clicks in easily.The whole stroller is super lightweight and seems sturdy, well made.I don’t have a little tiny baby so I have not tested the car seat option, however the whole setup I have seen and dealt with makes me think it would be very simple as well. Again, the video on the product page is extremely helpful and I recommend watching it.I hope you find this review helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but incredibly basic
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is nice, easy to assemble, and works well in a very basic way. In my opinion it’s definitely a little overpriced for what you’re getting, and there’s absolutely nothing fancy about it! I’m giving 4 stars because it’s a nice basic stroller, but pricey for not getting any extra benefits.Pros:-Easy to assemble-Seems like quality material that will last a long time-Easy to fold and storeCons:- The wheels are smaller than average with no padding, so they don’t absorb shock very well over rocks and bumps.-There’s only a tiny little cup holder that you can attach, and no other storage area on top for a phone or other quick convenience (there’s a little pocket on the back, but I personally like my stuff on top where I can see it). Of course theres the regular tote on the bottom for bag storage and stuff, but most strollers have that.-The top vent area to see baby is very small, and doesn’t have anything to keep it open so it’s constantly flapping closed (like there’s no strap or Velcro that keeps it open while walking so you can have a constant view of baby).-Pricier than other basic strollers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good baby stroller
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, 360 wheels, plenty of storage, and good for children up to 6-7 years old. Good quality stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Compact Stroller
reviews.reviewText: The Contours Quick Elite Lightweight Compact Fold Travel Baby Stroller offers convenience and portability for parents on the go. Its lightweight design and compact fold make it easy to maneuver and store, perfect for travel. The stroller is compatible with infant car seats, providing versatility for parents with young babies. The multi-position seat recline and sun canopy offer comfort and protection for the child. Additionally, the 5-point safety harness ensures security during rides. However, I found that the stroller lacks durability and feels flimsy at times. The wheels could be sturdier, especially when navigating rough terrain. While it offers convenience, improvements in overall build quality would make it a more reliable option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Contours Quick Elite Lightweight Compact Fold Travel Baby Stroller
reviews.reviewText: Great mid level stroller on a budget! Especially if it still has the thirty percent off. Very cute, lightweight and functional. It has all the necessities of a good stroller and has some great features like it fits many different car seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, great for quick outings
reviews.reviewText: Great stroller for quick outing trips. I leave this stroller at my parent's house, so they are able to take my child out for walks to the park. Since my child is passed the infant stage, I was not able to test car seat compatibility.PROS:- Affordable, but not the cheapest on the market- Super lightweight (14.2 pounds!)- One-hand fold, in case your other hand is busy holding your toddler- Adjustable seat recline with multiple positions for your child to sit up, lay back, or lie down for a quick nap- Travel-friendly and easy to load up on the carCONS:- Not that stylish to other strollers on the market- Won’t be the most comfortable for your toddler
